title: A New Gnar Skin
body:
OK so I've noticed there is only one Gnar skin and i was thinking of a few different designs. For instance a "Superman" themed one (Super Gnar) were he starts of wearing the classic nerdy glasses then when mega Gnar happens he gets the cape and what not.
There is a ton of other ideas I've had for champs other then Gnar aswell ( I get bored) so if anyone would like to know of any other ideas I've had or would just like to show there support for a new Gnar skin in general message me at Venatornox (OCE Servers)

replies.body:
That sounds like a great idea! but gnar has a skin thats about to come out in the next patch, its called Gentleman Gnar, and its pretty cool
so he no longer has only 1 skin.
Thanks haha :P and Yeh i just saw that it looks pretty cool :D

> OK so I've noticed there is only one Gnar skin and i was thinking of a few different designs. 
I drew a Partner - In - Crime Gnar skin to go along with the Pick Pocket Twitch and Evelynn skin. It isn't the best drawing but it is still a cool skin Idea.{{champion:150}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:28}}
Sorry, first time posting on boards - Don't know how to use the quote system properly yet. I'll figure it out eventually.
Yeh it sounds pretty cool buddy and all good that was my first time posting aswell haha
